content: Marek Grzes - School of Computing - University of Kent Dr Marek Grzes School of Computing University of Kent Home Publications Professional Activities Contact Thank you for visiting my website. I am a Senior Lecturer in the School of Computing at the University of Kent, where I research and teach topics related to machine learning and data analysis. I have particular interest in deep learning, representation learning, reinforcement learning, natural language processing and practical applications of AI. Research Students During my tenure at Kent, I have had the privilege of supervising several brilliant research students, whose names appear below and in the "Past Research Students" section.
